name: Callie Cactus
description:
Eddie Algae invites you to his birthday!

Hey there! Thanks for checking out my game entry for LOWREZJAM 2019!

Callie Cactus is a very simple and very short platformer inspired by Eddie Algae, an Australian indie game. You play Callie who has been invited to Eddie's birthday party. Make your way across the desert to Eddie's house, don't forget to pick up the birthday gifts along the way!

Not only is this my first game jam, it's also my first 'completed' game!  My goal for this jam was to just complete something, and what do you know, it happened!

CONTROLS

Move/Jump = "WASD" and ARROW KEYS
Pause music = "M" KEY

Colour palette is EDG32 by ENDESGA.

Music by Rolemusic, found on freemusicarchive.org.
